properties.name: web.starter.auth.enabled
properties.description: Enable @LoginRequired interceptor support.

properties.name: web.starter.auth.exclude-patterns
properties.description: Path patterns excluded from authentication checks.

properties.name: web.starter.auth.include-patterns
properties.description: Path patterns that require authentication checks.

properties.name: web.starter.cors.enabled
properties.description: Whether the starter should register a permissive CORS configuration.

properties.name: web.starter.cors.path-pattern
properties.description: Path pattern the CORS rule applies to.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.base-names
properties.description: Message source base names resolved from the classpath.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.cache-duration
properties.description: Duration that message bundles should be cached.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.default-locale
properties.description: Default locale used when none is supplied by the client.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.enabled
properties.description: Enable internationalised message resolution.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.encoding
properties.description: Encoding used when reading message bundles.

properties.name: web.starter.i18n.use-code-as-default-message
properties.description: Use message codes as default when no translation is found.

properties.name: web.starter.jackson.date-format
properties.description: Date format applied to java.util.Date based types.

properties.name: web.starter.logging.enabled
properties.description: Enable access logging filter.

properties.name: web.starter.logging.include-headers
properties.description: Include request headers in access logs.

properties.name: web.starter.logging.max-payload-size
properties.description: Maximum payload size captured in access logs.

properties.name: web.starter.response.default-error-code
properties.description: Fallback error code when no specific mapping is present.

properties.name: web.starter.response.default-error-message
properties.description: Fallback error message when no specific mapping is present.

properties.name: web.starter.response.enabled
properties.description: Enable global response wrapping.

properties.name: web.starter.response.success-code
properties.description: Default success code used in ApiResponse bodies.

properties.name: web.starter.response.success-message
properties.description: Default success message used in ApiResponse bodies.

properties.name: web.starter.response.wrap-on-null-body
properties.description: Wrap successful responses even when the controller returns null.

properties.name: web.starter.trace.enabled
properties.description: Enable trace id filter and propagation.

properties.name: web.starter.trace.header-name
properties.description: HTTP header used to propagate the trace id.
